resources.string: Please see the Company URL for your reference :

Dear Hiring manager, I came across a very exciting position on your job portal that I believe fits me perfectly. I am interested in applying for the position of %1$s at %2$s. I would love to talk to you in more detail regarding this amazing opportunity at your company. It would give me great pleasure to hear back from you regarding my application. Thank you !

Good communication skills, good working attitude, highly motivated, multitasking, resourceful & responsible towards works. Proficient in computer skills such as Microsoft words, excel Candidate that can start immediately will be preferred

Perform reception duties such as attending to walk-in guests, answering, screening, taking messages and forwarding incoming phone calls Perform basic bookkeeping and data entry duties Provide administrative support when required Filling & other administrative duties as assigned
